long_description: The JVC Adixxion camera battery pack offers backup power for your JVC Adixxion camera (sold separately), so you can extend the time you spend recording your outdoor adventures. Rechargeable, lithium ion battery provides an extra boost when your primary battery dies.
short_description: The JVC Adixxion camera battery pack offers backup power for your JVC Adixxion camera (sold separately), so you can extend the time you spend recording your outdoor adventures.
